main.name: Dawit Hagos ðŸ‘‹
main.description: Love to build products using Vue, React and Flutter....
main.bio: Software Engineer with 3 years of professional software development experience. Built 3 cross-platform mobile apps and 5 web applications. Very well experienced in delivering outstanding cross-platform apps that run on Android/IOS using Flutter. Excellent reputation developing web applications with enterprise frameworks such as Spring Boot and Vuejs. I'm a Certified Azure Cloud Administrator also over 2 years of experience working with AWS (Amazon Web Service) managing cloud deployment.
main.contactmessage: Love to hear from you. Please reach-out with one of the Socials. Thank You  ðŸ™‚

work.title: Excellerent Technology Solutions
description: Worked closely with QA Team to convert Large Web Apps with different client requirements to be WCAG 2.1 (Accessibility) AA standard compliance compatible.
Originated and developed creative design concepts using that exceeded client expectations. Developed and implemented process flow improvement.
Built consistent front-end features. Designed and updated layouts to meet usability and performance requirements.
Worked on the backend added missing data points with features related to website accessibility migration.

work.title: Medco Technology Solutions PLC
description: Led a team of 3 software engineers through the entire development process of the cross-platform apps using Flutter that run on Android and IOS starting from design, development, and deployment of the apps.
Configured, deployed, and monitored Highly Available web applications on AWS with services such as EC2, S3, Route53, and RDS.
Introduced cross-platform development in the company and team from Native app development.
Led the development and deployment of the COVID19 system where till to date it served more than >40,000 patients.
Collaborated with project managers to select ambitiously, but realistic coding milestones on pre-release software project development.
Worked on open-source products customization that fits requirements and uses case of local medical facilities and health centers.

work.title: Mobile Application Developer and System Admin and Integrator
description: Developed high-quality, concise Android applications to go with the developed system.
Originated and developed creative design concepts using that exceeded client expectations. Developed and implemented process flow improvement.
Coordinated ongoing technical training and personal development classes for staff members.
Consulted with network engineering staff to evaluate hardware and software requirements for new system development.
Managed to maintain the company database with essential account and clinical information.
Reviewed technical documentation to complete system maintenance and repair.
Trained and mentored a number of new personnel hired to fulfill various roles.

testimonials.text: Dawit is an outstanding developer, his attention to detail, taking products to another level, being a leader in his team brainstorming and collaborating with team members. He is very humble and technically Very Good. I would definitely recommend him.
